contentData.p: The Ziguinchor region is one of the 14 administrative regions of Senegal. Bordered with Gambia, it forms the western part of Casamance, known as Lower Casamance. Communications with Dakar pass almost exclusively by sea or across the territory of The Gambia. Ziguinchor is a city of 205,294 inhabitants in 2013 in southern Senegal, capital of the Ziguinchor department of the Ziguinchor region and the historic region of Casamance
